title: 2/BD, Controlled-entry access, In Henderson
posting_body: South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.

With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.

Polished kitchen countertops-Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity-Ceiling fans in dining room-Subway tile kitchen backsplash-Separate dining area-Wood-style plank flooring-Stainless steel appliances including refrigerator and dishwasher                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                Featured amenity-Exterior storage available

Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements-Controlled-entry access-Professional onsite management-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance-Fenced dog park with pet watering station-24-hour fitness center with free weights and cardio machines                                                                                         Featured amenity-Package locker with 24/7 access to packages-Onsite playground-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)
